text:
Hi everybody! One million!
[trumpets herald]
I just reached one million subscribers recently.

Oh my God let's congratulate together!
[Clap clap clap]
I cannot believe! Since I started 2007 it has been nine years
In nine years, my subscribers number has increased gradually.
My subscribers never go rapidly.
Just a little by little by little
and now one million
I can't believe this.
You guys watch my videos, you follow my recipes
You make so delicious food and share with your family
and friends
you got a lot of compliments
and then your friends ask you guys: "Oh, where did you learn this chicken?"
"Where did you learn how to make kimchi?"
"Oh, from Maangchi!"
"Check out YouTube! Maangchi!"
and then, gradually my subscribers going up.
My subscribers are different from usual YouTube viewers.
You know why? I know you guys are so interested in cooking!
You guys are so passionate cooks!
Through my website, through my YouTube videos I met wonderful wonderful interesting people
around the world
We gotta celebrate this!
I'd like to give you something unique!
Ta-da!
This is a t-shirt I made.
Here is my handwriting. I just worked so hard to make nice handwriting
because I'm not good at handwriting. It took one day to make it
from the beginning to make the nice font.
You see? My logo, and "ma-sin-neun saam." Ma-sin-neun means "delicious," saam means "life."
Delicious life! Our life, our lives should be delicious, isn't it?
Food should be delicious, life should be delicious,

People who you meet should be delicious! 
[laughs]
I saw some video one lady, she's the oldest lady in the world
and then the reporter asked her:
"What's the best thing to happen to you every day?"
The lady answered, she said: "Oh, delicious food every day I'm eating, longer, more, one day more, one day more."
I thought that was a really really great answer, because I agree with her!
To celebrate my 1 million subscriptions I like to give away
I will choose 30 people.
Three-zero! And you guys no matter where you live, I'm going to send you this.
To enter this contest, go to my website.
maangchi.com/1million
and you will know how to enter this contest.
I wish I could give all one million all of you guys
but I cannot afford! [laughs]
You like to wear this t-shirt? Really cute!
So, thirty people! You guys are going to be chosen.
I will keep posting my videos on YouTube
Because you guys are so special for me
I will keep working hard to make a delicious delicious recipe
so that you guys can make this and you can share all together. Let's live delicious life!
